comment:
Song et al, 1998, contains no detail about the refolding method, but cites:

Qi et al, 1994: http://refold.med.monash.edu.au/view.php?type=1&id=371

Minetti CA et al. (1997) Structural and Functional Characterization of a Recombinant PorB Class 2Protein from Neisseria meningitidis. CONFORMATIONAL STABILITY AND PORIN ACTIVITY. J. Biol. Chem. 272:10710-10720.  ( http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9099721 )
subject: The cited paper, Song et al, 1998 is not the original reference for this refolding method

comment:
The published protocol states that IBs solubilised in:
8 M urea, 50mM TrisHCl, 1mM EDTA, 100mM NaCl pH8.0 + 0.1 mM PMSF were diluted 1:1 into 10 % (w/v) Zwittergen 3-14
... meaning that the actual Refolding condition contains a final concentration of 5 % Zwittergen 3-14 (not 0.05 % as recorded).

The Post-refolding purification on Sephacryl S-300 used the buffer:
100mM TrisHCl, 200mM NaCl, 10mM EDTA, 0.05% Zwittergen 3,14, 0.02% azide.
subject: Refolding condition is not correctly recorded

comment: Although this is listed under the chaperone-assisted category, there appear to be no chaperones used.
subject: Chaperone assisted?
